title: U.S., Cuban Soccer Teams Face-Off In Havana
teaser: History will be made in Havana on Tuesday when the New York Cosmos take on the Cuban National Team in a soccer match. It's the first time a U.S. professional sports team will play in Cuba since the two countries opened diplomatic ties in December.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
